channel.title: Help Me Please I Wana Make Runescape P Sever But I Need Help
channel.description:

item.title: Help Me Please I Wana Make Runescape P Sever But I Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Number_two Number_two
item.description:
@Number_two wrote:

[quote=“Cool Kiid, post:10, topic:386960”]Jesus christ. Do you know anything about the basics of rsps? First things first. Download jdk then set up the enviornmentel values. Then you make a no-ip download the client check it. then you go to firewall. Add a rule for the port 43594 then you go to your default gateway and make the port. You’re done.

Ps- You HAVE to connect to 127.0.0.1 as the ip you can’t connect to your no-ip but others can.[/quote]

Btw i dont No anything About Computers So not My falt i need Someone Who Can tell me Everything And you Guys Arnt Helping at All …

My Skills Are
Fucking Brads
Chilling
Smoking

So Fuck you

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me Please I Wana Make Runescape P Sever But I Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Cool_Kiid Cool Kiid
item.description:
@Cool_Kiid wrote:

Ps- You HAVE to connect to 127.0.0.1 as the ip you can’t connect to your no-ip but others can.
[/quote]
*Enviroment variables. And yes you can type in your own No-IP and still connect, as I have done it.
[/quote]

It depends. You obviously did it on a 317.

item.title: Help Me Please I Wana Make Runescape P Sever But I Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Fuse Fuse
item.description:
@Fuse wrote:

[quote=“Cool Kiid, post:10, topic:386960”]Jesus christ. Do you know anything about the basics of rsps? First things first. Download jdk then set up the enviornmentel values. Then you make a no-ip download the client check it. then you go to firewall. Add a rule for the port 43594 then you go to your default gateway and make the port. You’re done.

Ps- You HAVE to connect to 127.0.0.1 as the ip you can’t connect to your no-ip but others can.[/quote]
*Enviroment variables. And yes you can type in your own No-IP and still connect, as I have done it.

item.title: Help Me Please I Wana Make Runescape P Sever But I Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Cool_Kiid Cool Kiid
item.description:
@Cool_Kiid wrote:

Jesus christ. Do you know anything about the basics of rsps? First things first. Download jdk then set up the enviornmentel values. Then you make a no-ip download the client check it. then you go to firewall. Add a rule for the port 43594 then you go to your default gateway and make the port. You’re done.

Ps- You HAVE to connect to 127.0.0.1 as the ip you can’t connect to your no-ip but others can.

Read full topic

One thing i need help

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

This Is Quote [This will then bring up your router page, and you will need to click something like ‘Applications and gaming’, though mine just says ‘Firewall’. After you have clicked this, you need to add a new user defined application. Any name is compatible, as long as you follow the syntax shown below and set the application to ‘hosted’.]

And i Have 2 Find ‘Applications and gaming’

Plz help Find it

24159gm.gif1024×819
